title: Schedule Your Vaccine | Trinity Health Of New England
description: Trinity Health Of New England is offering a number of methods you can schedule your vaccine appointment, provided you are eligible under the current phase laid out by the state of Connecticut or Massachusetts.
cleaned_text: Of New England is following ecommended guidance from the Center for Disease Control (CDC), the U.S Food and Drug Administration (FDA), and the [Connecticut](https://portal.ct.gov/vaccine-portal/COVID-19-Vaccination-Phases) and [Massachusetts](https://www.mass.gov/info-details/massachusetts-covid-19-vaccine-information) Departments of Public Health for the safe administration of the COVID-19 vaccine. A COVID-19 vaccine, designed to prevent the COVID-19 disease, is the best hope for ending the pandemic. We know you may have questions and concerns about these vaccines. That's why Trinity Health Of New England is committed to keeping you and our communities informed and educated as major developments occur. [Learn more](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/recommendations-process.html) about CDC Vaccine recommendations.
